headline: Asylum hotel ruling won't feel like much of a victory at Home Office
summary: The government avoids having its asylum policy thrown into chaos but the court ruling is a gift for its opponents.

headline: Tories call for investigation into Rayner's tax affairs
summary: The deputy prime minister's spokesperson says she paid the relevant tax when buying her Hove flat.

headline: Ministers didn't do cost review of council mergers
summary: The government relied on a report by a lobbyist group that now says reorganisation could make no savings.

headline: Home Office set to pull 'balloon-craft' job at migrant detention centre
summary: Minister Seema Malhotra has called on the contractor to remove the jobs at the immigration removal centre.

headline: MSP denies hiding camera in Scottish Parliament toilet
summary: South Scotland MSP Colin Smyth was earlier suspended by Labour over charges of possessing indecent child images.

headline: Tories win Broxtowe by-election by five votes
summary: Judy Couch won the Nuthall East and Strelley seat with 405 votes.

headline: Ed Davey to boycott Trump state banquet over Gaza
summary: The Lib Dem leader says he wants to send the president a message that he has the power to end the crisis.

headline: Clarkson for PM, attacks on police dogs: Do Parliament petitions make a difference?
summary: People love signing petitions to get issues they care about debated by MPs - but some can't resist having a laugh.

headline: Suranne Jones: Playing the prime minister changes your perception of politics
summary: Suranne Jones plays the Prime Minister whose husband is kidnapped in new political thriller, Hostage.

headline: Asylum hotel ruling leaves ministers with major headache
summary: The government will now have to find new places to house asylum seekers, while hoping other areas don't take similar legal action.

headline: Starmer hails breakthrough on Ukraine - but anxiety over its future remains
summary: Donald Trump's commitment to Ukraine's security is key to a lasting peace, the UK prime minister says.

headline: Chris Mason: Trump visit provides Starmer with invaluable access
summary: The PM's time with the president helped burnish a relationship as solid as it is improbable.

headline: Who is in charge? The prime minister's authority is in question again
summary: It's been a week of dismissals, disagreements and backbench bust-ups, writes Laura Kuenssberg.

headline: MSP accused of hiding camera in parliament toilet
summary: The MSP said he was "fully co-operating" with officers and is due to appear at court at a later date.

headline: Houthi prime minister killed in Israeli airstrike on Yemen capital
summary: Prime Minister Ahmed al-Rahawi was the most senior Houthi official to be killed in the Israeli-U.S. campaign against the Iran-backed rebels.

headline: White House declares $4.9B in foreign aid unilaterally canceled in end-run around Congress’ funding power
summary: The administration is setting up clash with Capitol Hill over its use of the "pocket rescission."

headline: Former Ukraine parliament speaker shot dead in Lviv
summary: A murder investigation has been launched, Ukraine’s Prosecutor General's Office said.

headline: US must join forces with Europe to pressure Putin, say EU foreign ministers
summary: The call comes after U.S. President Donald Trump set a deadline for Vladimir Putin to meet with his Ukrainian counterpart.

headline: Зеленський призначив військовим омбудсманом Ольгу Решетилову
summary: Президент Володимир Зеленський призначив на посаду військового омбудсмана правозахисницю Ольгу Решетилову. Джерело: глава держави в Telegram Пряма мова: "Підписав указ про призначення Ольги Решетилової (Кобилинської) уповноваженою президента України з питань захисту прав військовослужбовців та членів сімей наших вої…

headline: Шантаж, революція та вибори з російським впливом: чого чекати Україні від сусідів у 2025 році
summary: Якщо минулий рік називали "роком виборів", то 2025-й стане роком змін. Обрання нового президента США вже стало каталізатором багатьох процесів...

headline: Обмін полоненими з РФ: Україна повернула 189 своїх громадян
summary: Внаслідок нового обміну військовополонених у понеділок 30 грудня Україна повернула 189 своїх оборонців. Джерело: президент Володимир Зеленський у Telegram, Координаційний штаб з питань поводження з військовополоненими, омбудсман Дмитро Лубінець Пряма мова Зеленського: "Повернення наших людей з російського полону - ц…

headline: Budget 2026 : François Ruffin appelle à « demander de faire les efforts à ceux qui ont les poches pleines »
summary: « Notre grande affaire, ce n’est pas de faire détester tel ministre», « la police » ou « le Parti socialiste », mais « de nous faire aimer », a déclaré le député du Nord, l’un des défenseurs de l’union de la gauche.

headline: Edouard Philippe prend ses distances avec François Bayrou sur les rapports entre générations
summary: Le premier ministre avait fait le distinguo entre les jeunes, selon lui principales victimes de l’endettement, et le « confort » des seniors. « Je n’accuse pas les boomeurs d’égoïsme », a réagi le président d’Horizons.

headline: Le PS présente un budget « de gauche » pour remplacer celui de François Bayrou, afin « de trouver une majorité » à l’Assemblée nationale
summary: Suspension de la réforme des retraites, taxe sur les patrimoines, baisse de la CSG et relance économique… Le plan dévoilé samedi par les socialistes à Blois prévoit 14 milliards d’euros d’économie.
